headline: Could US Semiconductor Mandates Reshape GlobalFoundries (GFS) Strategy Amid New Photonics Partnerships?
summary: In recent days, Applied Materials announced it will partner with GlobalFoundries to build a waveguide fabrication facility in Singapore, and GlobalFoundries also revealed a collaboration with Egis Technology to advance direct time-of-flight sensor production on its 55nm platform. These developments highlight GlobalFoundries' expanding role in manufacturing next-generation photonics and sensing technologies for applications spanning AI, augmented reality, and automotive markets. We'll now...
